text: Valerie Hoyle (born February 14, 1964) is an American politician. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives from Oregon's 4th congressional district since 2023 She is a former Democratic member of the Oregon House of Representatives from 2009 to 2017. In December 2021, Hoyle announced that she would be a candidate for the U.S. House of Representatives in 2022. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Politicians from California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Val Hoyle
